titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Gilbert Pattisson, [1938 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Motto: Eleusis servat quod ostendat revisentibus.

This is to tell you a) that I enjoied being with you the other day, b) to ask you to do the following: please let me have Â£ 50 (fifty pounds) of my money, either by sending me a cheque or by somehow sending the money to Barkleys Bank in Cambridge where I have a deposit account. Also please let me know your plans for the immediate future.
